name: jolly-and-bainian-email-sender
description: Lambda function for sending emails via SES

scripts.build: rm -rf dist lambda.zip && tsc && cd dist && zip -r ../lambda.zip . && cd .. && zip -r lambda.zip *.html node_modules
scripts.deploy: aws s3 cp lambda.zip s3://jolly-and-bainian-bucket/lambdas/emailSender.zip && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name JollyAndBainianEmailSender --s3-bucket jolly-and-bainian-bucket --s3-key lambdas/emailSender.zip
